commitments.statement: Add npm download counts and GitHub stars to MilestoneTracker with '0' shown honestly
Show '0/1 production deployments' in dashboard
Add /status command showing role, priority, path to advancement
Explore UBI-style credit distribution for dormant nodes
Implement Gini coefficient measurement for network inequality
Make fee distribution DAO-controlled, not hardcoded constants
Emergency alerts to all participants, not just stakers
Invert tier system: bioregional weight >= satellite weight in ecological_gia.rs
Add governance.rs to CryptoSaint specifying who proposes, who votes, quorum rules
commitments.verificationNote: Created 764-line governance.rs with ProposalRules, VotingRules, QuorumRules, DecisionScope, TimingRules. Includes GovernanceEngine and 'Hard Questions' section. Commit f690c43.

commitments.statement: Publish model assumptions as DOL schemas, not hidden in ML weights
commitments.verificationNote: Created schemas/model-assumptions.dol in cryptosaint.io with 400+ lines documenting all hardcoded constants: reputation bounds, credit tiers, consensus params, network config. Commit 259fee4.

commitments.statement: Document BRICS alignment explicitly in CryptoSaint README
commitments.verificationNote: README.md created with BRICS Alignment section explaining rationale, caveats, and geopolitical context. Commit 070b77e.

commitments.statement: Extract self-critique questions into standalone checklist accessible without reading full blueprint
commitments.verificationNote: Created SELF-CRITIQUE-CHECKLIST.md with 10 questions to answer before implementing any blueprint. Commit 0f2ad7a.

commitments.statement: Plain language first: any /topology-health output leads with natural language summaries, eigenvalues in appendix
commitments.verificationNote: Updated SKILL.md with Output Format Principles section and restructured thermo output to SUMMARY→DETAILS→APPENDIX format. Technical metrics now in appendix. Commit 08437db in univrs-skills.

commitments.statement: Build simple version first: implement only algebraic connectivity, test if it helps before adding more metrics
Resist complexity creep: Phase 1 only, with explicit criteria for whether Phase 2 is needed
commitments.verificationNote: Added Phase 1 Exit Criteria section with 5 measurable thresholds and 3 automatic disqualifiers. Commit 6442ac4.

commitments.statement: Archive GDL blueprint, revisit only when network has actual participants to analyze
Future release notes will be clearer about what 'compatible' actually means (migration path with deadline, not permanent support)
commitments.verificationNote: Created RELEASE-NOTES-TEMPLATE.md with explicit 'What Backward Compatible Actually Means' section and deprecation timeline requirements. Commit 46e17db.

commitments.statement: Future release notes will say 'Rust-aligned' not just 'clearer' - name the trade-off explicitly
commitments.verificationNote: Template includes required Trade-offs table with 'Who Benefits / Who Pays' columns, anti-pattern examples showing 'Rust-aligned' vs vague 'clearer'. Commit 46e17db.

commitments.statement: Reconsider indefinite support for old syntax (gene/exegesis/constraint) - compiler can handle both
Find real users before the next breaking change - no more changing syntax for ghosts
Preserve DOL identity: keep 'fun' instead of Rust's 'fn' to maintain distinctiveness
commitments.verificationNote: Confirmed: DOL v0.8.0 uses 'fun' keyword, not 'fn'. Verified in learn.univrs.io tutorials.

commitments.statement: Critique v0.9.0 BEFORE deployment, not after - write release notes, generate critique, respond, then decide whether to ship
commitments.verificationNote: Added Pre-Release Critique Process section to RELEASE-NOTES-TEMPLATE.md with 7-step workflow and Critique Gate Checklist. Commit cec4078.
